text:
I'm Robert Huckman, Professor
of Business Administration,

and my research focuses on
improving quality and lowering

the cost of health
care delivery.

I'm a Professor of
Business Administration.

on innovation and pricing

Professor at Harvard Business

School, and I study performance
management systems in health

I'm Ray Kluender, an Assistant

psychology and economics
